gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 109, Bulls 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Bulls, 109-95. Max Strus led the way for the Cavaliers with 26 points, seven assists and five 3PM, while Jarrett Allen added 19 points, 17 rebounds and seven assists in the victory. DeMar DeRozan (21 points, eight assists) and Nikola Vucevic (20 points, 12 rebounds) combined for 41 points for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 17-13 on the season, while the Bulls fall to 13-18.
